name: !HEY! Long Time No See
description:
PLEASE!!! Due to an unknow problem my game won't show up in the browser. Please see this link so that you can see some gameplay. Have fun watching! 

In this cute puzzle game, you are someone who haven't seen his friend in a long time. Your goal is to choose events that will cause your reunion. Watch out, you might ran out of time to meet him! Succeed an you and your friend will be joined together.
